form.LN:
Kadar je beseda
around
predlog ali prislov, jo lahko uporabljamo namesto
round.

sense.def:
Kar je
round
, ima obliko žoge ali kroga.

seg.quote: ...the round bulge of the girl's belly.

sense.def:
Kadar je neka stvar ali skupina stvari
round something else
ali
around something else
, je razporejena na vseh straneh nečesa drugega.

seg.quote: She was wearing a scarf round her head.
We were sitting round a table eating and drinking.
There was a wall all the way round.

sense.def:
Kadar se ena stvar giblje
round another
ali
around another
, se premika v krogu okoli druge, ki leži ali stoji v središču tega kroga.

seg.quote: The earth moves round the sun.

sense.def:
Kadar se obrnemo ali pogledamo
round
ali
around
, to storimo tako, da potem gledamo v drugo smer.

seg.quote: He swung round and faced the window.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj premika
round and round
, se vrti ali kroži.

seg.quote: A swallow flew frantically round and round.

sense.def:
Kadar gremo
round something
ali
around something
, gremo mimo tiste stvari v krivulji.

seg.quote: The boys had disappeared around a corner.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj dogaja ali obstaja na veliko mestih na določenem območju, lahko rečemo, da se dogaja ali obstaja
round
ali
around that place
.

seg.quote: Think of what's happening politically round the world.

sense.def:
Kadar gremo
round a place
ali
around a place
, gremo na več različnih krajev na nekem območju.

To come round
pomeni priti na obisk.

seg.quote: I'd like to ask him round for dinner.

sense.def:
To round something
pomeni iti okoli nečesa v krivulji.

seg.quote: ...as he rounded the corner at the top of the stairs.

sense.def:
A round of events
je niz povezanih dogodkov, ki je del večjega niza.

seg.quote: Turkey is eager for a further round of talks.

sense.def:
To go on one's rounds
pomeni, da na primer zdravnik opravi več obiskov, ki so del njegove službe.

A round
je skupina tekem v enem izmed več delov tekmovanja.

Pri golfu je
a round
ena tekma.

V boksarskem tekmovanju je
a round
eno izmed obdobij boja med boksarjema.

Kadar nekdo
buys a round of drinks
, plača pijačo vsem v določeni skupini.

A round of ammunition
je ena ali več krogel, ki jih izstrelimo v enem streljanju.

To round up animals or people
pomeni zbrati živali ali ljudi skupaj.

seg.quote: They had rounded up people at gunpoint.
